title.rendered: Digiperform’s Digital Marketing Workshop for Retailers & E-commerce in Vizag

content.rendered:
THE CHECK OUT  – HELPING YOU SELL MORE

Digital Marketing Workshop for Retailers & E-commerce

Digiperform in Vizag had organized a workshop – The Check Out – on Digital Marketing for Retail & Ecommerce, dated 27th May 2018.

The workshop was a great success in the presence of honourable Guests:

The agenda of the workshop was to create awareness regarding “How retailers can connect with an ever-growing online audience and embrace the power of Digital”.

The topics discussed during the workshop:

  • Use of search influence to create brand authority everywhere.

  • Setting up a successful Google shopping campaign.

  • Tips for PPC campaign and overcome challenges.

  • Importance of mobile-friendly user experience to define business success.

  • The power of Social Media Advertising.

  • Claim business listing on online local directory sites like Google+.

  • Email is the Most effective Digital Channel for Personalization.

 

Speakers of the Workshop: Saumya Rajan, Prasad G and Venkateswar Rao N
